name: Single Fighter
description:
In most fighting games, you have multiple character choices, and that makes some characters more powerful than others, such as Eddy on Tekken and Bayonetta on Super Smash Bros. for Wii U. But what happens when you have only ONE CHARACTER option and only ONE ATTACK? Now THIS is a fight where it comes down to skill! (or not)

Controls: First of all, this game MUST be played with two controllers. Use the left joystick to move your character. If you use an Xbox 360/One controller, attack with A. If you're using a PS4, attack with Square. To close the game, press the escape (esc) key, the start button on an Xbox 360/One controller or R2 on a PS4 controller.

This game is being developed for the GMTK Game Jam 2019, where the theme was "Only one". The source code can be found at https://github.com/lucena-fr4ct1ons/gmtk-game if you want to check it out.
